TopicTitle: My house almost got hit by lightning.

Articles.Content:
Of course the day I have a major headache it becomes a thunder & lightning storm.

Anyways, a flash of lightning hits right beside the house, hits near a car yet starts no fire...

This completely scared the hell out of me.

Luckily my house wasn\'t shocked...
i have had many close calls before
One day, during a thunderstorm, a lighting bolt hit the street next to us. The entire house shook like hell, and the lights went own for a couple seconds.

> 
> Try switching SCE to AUX. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

'Try switching SCE AUX to AUX.'

> 
> Of course the day I have a major headache it becomes a thunder & lightning storm.

I get them too. And it hurts ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Our grandparents negihbors house just burned down because of lightning.

All that happend is it turned my living room TV off...

I think the bolt hit someones car, all I heard after the shock was a car alarm...

Eh bad luck for the person..

The storm stopped after fifteen minutes.

> 
> Our grandparents negihbors house just burned down because of lightning.

I\'m so sorry.
